description: The order follows a court decision to lift a partial lockdown on the capital and nine nearby cities.
title: Coronavirus: Spain imposes state of emergency on Madrid
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain imposes state of emergency on Madrid - BBC News
maintext: Ahead of a long holiday weekend, with many people planning to leave the capital, it was unclear how that might be reinforced. However, the interior minister said some 7,000 security forces would be deployed around the city to ensure measures were respected.
